sen.j: 日蓮門下の諸派に於ける法華曼荼羅は、日蓮が末法の時代に対応するべく、法華経後半十四品（本門）に登場する、如来、菩薩、明王、天部などを表したものである。
sen.e: Hokke Mandala of Nichiren disciples expressed Nyorai (Tathāgata), Bosatsu (Bodhisattva), Myoo (Wisdom King), and Tenbu (deities who reside in a heavenly realm, one of six realms in which the souls of living beings transmigrate from one to another) which appear in the last fourteen chapters of the Lotus Sutra (Honmon) that Nichiren has to respond to at the end of the world.

sen.e: The "Doshi Honzon" (a charnel house of temples) used in the Nichirensho Sect funeral have 'Enma Hoo' (the judge at the gate of hell) instead of 'Amaterasu Omikami (the Sun Goddess)' and 'Godo Myokan' instead of Hachiman Daibosatsu.'

The 'Doshi Honzon' (principle image of priest, which is placed in a ossuary of temples) used in the Nichiren Sho Sect funeral have 'Enma Hoo' (the judge at the gate of Hell) instead of 'Amaterasu Omikami' and 'Godo Myokan' (Officers of the Hell of five posthumous worlds) instead of 'Hachiman Daibosatsu.'
